name: Praktika.ai Company
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence platform designed to help people improve spoken English skills. The company's platform helps to prepare for a job interview in English, provides a robot that will role-play an interview and also maintain the dialogues as real interviews, provides a personal score and improvement tips, helps to improve speaking and listening skills, and enhances writing skills during chat interactions, enabling learners to receive AI language feedback and get AI-generated hints to improve language skills.
one_liner: Developer of an artificial intelligence platform designed to help people improve spoken English skills. The company's platform helps to prepare for a job interview in English, provides a robot that will role-play an interview and also maintain the dialogues as real interviews, provides a personal score and improvement tips, helps to improve speaking and listening skills, and enhances writing skills during chat interactions, enabling learners to receive AI language feedback and get AI-generated hints to improve language skills.
